sentences.en: "The fuel gauge is broken." — "Broken? How do you mean?"
sentences.cn: “燃油表坏了。”——“坏了？你说清楚点？”

sentences.en: After several hours of aimless searching they were getting low on fuel.
sentences.cn: 在几个小时漫无目的的搜寻之后，他们快没燃料了。

sentences.en: Both springs in the fuel pump were broken.
sentences.cn: 燃料泵里的两个弹簧都断了。

sentences.en: Buses and trains use much less fuel per person than cars.
sentences.cn: 公共汽车和火车的人均燃料耗费量比轿车小得多。

sentences.en: By now the plane was running out of fuel.
sentences.cn: 现在，这架飞机的燃料快用完了。

sentences.en: Coal is one of the cheapest fuels.
sentences.cn: 煤是最廉价的燃料之一。

sentences.en: Higher fuel prices took their toll.
His comments are bound to add fuel to the debate.
sentences.cn: 他的话必将为争论推波助澜。

sentences.en: In May engineers found a leak in a hydrogen fuel line.
sentences.cn: 5月份工程师们在一条氢燃料管线上发现一条裂隙。

sentences.en: Radioactive waste is simply spent fuel.
sentences.cn: 放射性废物就是用后的燃料。

sentences.en: Running costs are coming down because of cheaper fuel.
sentences.cn: 燃料价格下来了，运营费用也会跟着下降。

sentences.en: Tanks are heavy on fuel and destructive to roads.
sentences.cn: 坦克要耗费大量的燃料，而且会破坏道路。

sentences.en: The authorities have urged people to stock up on fuel.
sentences.cn: 当局已经敦促人们储备燃料。

sentences.en: The fuel gauge reads below zero.
sentences.cn: 燃油表显示油量在零以下。

sentences.en: The new Metro is designed to run on unleaded fuel.
sentences.cn: 新的地铁系统设计为使用无铅燃料。

sentences.en: The van was fuelled and waiting in the basement car park.
sentences.cn: 小货车加好了油，在地下停车场等着。

sentences.en: We’d better fuel up at the next town.
sentences.cn: 我们最好在下个小镇加油。

phrases.phrase: add fuel to the fire (或 flames)
phrases.tran_cn: (喻)（尤指以挑衅性言论）火上加油
代用燃料；可替代燃料；人造液体燃料
节约燃料；耗热率；燃料经济学
燃料功率，燃料效率；燃油效率
燃油喷射系统；燃料喷入系统
燃油附加费；燃油费；燃油特别付加运赁
喷气燃料；航空煤油；喷气式发动机燃料

trans.tran_en: a substance such as coal, gas, or oil that can be burned to produce heat or energy
if you fuel a vehicle, or if it fuels up, fuel is put into it
if you fuel a vehicle, or if it fuels up, fuel is put into it
if you fuel a vehicle, or if it fuels up, fuel is put into it
